explanation: [0-0] A man in a plaid shirt and jeans faces the camera. He is standing in a room with light blue walls decorated with two paintings. On each of his shoulders rests a semi-circular cardboard piece. Behind him, a long black tube extends from above.

[0-6] The man turns around, revealing a blue vacuum cleaner behind him. He uses silver tape to secure the white cardboard between his shoulders. After turning back to face the camera, the scene transitions to him wearing a dark jacket and a red Santa hat. He then proceeds to spin around once more. Immediately, the scene shifts again, showing him wearing the Santa hat and sitting at a table eating. On the table are several plates of vegetables and red wine. Behind him, there is a Christmas tree and a cabinet with gifts on it. He scoops up a small Brussels sprout from the plate in front of him with a spoon, brings it to his nose, and says something.
